ing: 1 tablespoon vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your HeartÂ® VeganaiseÂ®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A terrific way to add kohlrabi into your menu. Serve with wrap and stir-fried tempeh for a yummy lunch. Yummy!"
ins: Whisk vinegar, vegan mayonnaise, agave nectar, mustard seeds, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until dressing is smooth. Stir apples, kohlrabi, and carrots into dressing until evenly coated. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for flavors to blend, at least 1 hour.
